'''Professor Spafford''' was a minor character appearing in the episode "[[The One With The Soap Opera Party]]". He was portrayed by [[Ken Lerner]].

[[Ross Geller|Ross]] met him when he joined the former's department at the university, alongside [[Charlie Wheeler]]. Ross was asked to show them both around the campus, and because he was attracted to Charlie, he tried to seize an opportunity to spend the day with her alone when Spafford didn't turn up at first, only for Spafford to then walk through the door and introduce himself, causing Ross to exclaim "Dammit!" much to the bemusement of Charlie and Spafford. However, Ross later got the chance to spend the day alone with Charlie anyway, as Spafford spoke very slowly and with a lack of enthusiasm or emotion, causing Ross and Charlie to find him so boring socially that they decided to abandon him while he was in the bathroom. He was never seen again after that.
